text: "I'm Goin' Down" is a 1985 song by Bruce Springsteen and is the sixth single from his seventh studio album Born in the U.S.A.. It went to number 9 in the United States, number 13 in Sweden, number 20 in Italy, number 23 in Canada, number 41 in Australia and number 61 in Germany. It did not chart in New Zealand or the United Kingdom. ==Formats and track listing== *7-inch single #"I'm Goin' Down" – 3:29 #"Janey, Don't You Lose Heart" – 3:23 *12-inch single #"I'm Goin' Down" – 3:29 #"Janey, Don't You Lose Heart" – 3:23 #"Held Up Without a Gun" – 1:15 == References == Category:1985 songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs
title: I'm Goin' Down
